ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We rescued those who had iman and who had taqwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We deliver those who believe and take heed for themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And We delivered those who believed and were wont to avoid disobeying (Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We saved the faithful God-fearing believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We rescued those who accepted faith and used to fear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We saved those who believed, and had Taqwa of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We delivered those who believed and who guarded (against evil).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And We delivered those who believed and were godfearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And we saved those who believed and used to ward off (evil).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and We saved those who believed in and feared God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We delivered those who believed and were wont to fear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And We delivered those who had faith and were Godwary.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We saved those who believed and practised righteousness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We saved those who believed, and used to fear Allah, and keep their duty to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And We saved those who believed and were cautious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We saved those who believed and were pious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We saved those who believed and used to fear Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:53] And We delivered those who believed, in Sālih — and they numbered 4,000 — and were fearful, of idolatry.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And we saved those who believed) in Salih (and used to ward off (evil)) and used to ward off disbelief, idolatry and indecencies.
